content.description: Left of two bolted lines with same start.
content.location: From right side of Raptor Bluff locate rappel chains that take you to the base of Malt-O-Meal and Breakfast-O-Champions or access the bottom by way of the Clock Tower trail.

content.description: Locate top anchors on top of Raptor Bluff. Climbs left side west wall as you leave the Secrete Cleft.
content.location: Top anchors located on top Raptor Bluff about 30 feet past the first set of anchors.

content.description: Climb the wall to the left of the dark water streak.
content.location: After exiting the top of the Secret Cleft follow the trail to a small saddle where you will find top anchors without chains above the west wall. Use these anchors to rappel down onto the the large forested ledge above the Bouldering Tube. Caution: watch for any potential rock fall hazards as you rappel over the top.

content.description: Bolted line right of two lines beginning at the same location.
content.location: This short wall lies between the Secret Cleft and Clock Tower. Access bottom of route by way of the Clock Tower Trail or access top anchors by way of the Secret Cleft trail.

content.description: After scrambling up through the Secret Cleft, a trail on top of the South Comb will lead to the tallest point on the Comb. This is Raptor Bluff, which has top access to a handful of routes on the East Side of the Comb. You can also scramble further along the ridge to gain top access to the East Side of the Secret Cleft.
